name: Coren's Run
description:
Help Coren run backwards around the planet! Avoid the hostile Geomites using quick reflexes and Coren's shrinking powers! How high can your score go?

Coren's run is an endless runner style game made by Solo developer and is inspired by the popular mobile game Temple Run. It features a low poly, cutesy art style to make it more appealing to casual audiences. To earn the highest score, try your best to dodge enemies by the narrowest margin!

Runs take less than 10 minutes.

Controls

Move: A,D or Left/Right Arrows

Shrink: S or Down Arrow

Credits

Game Design, Code, and 3d Models were done by BoredClay

All third party assets are accredited in game, check some of them out!

Contact

I'd love to hear from you!

Questions, Comments, or Criticisms can be left here on Itch.io. Bug reports or other messages should be emailed to boredclay21@gmail.com.
